column1: Little Goat Diner////The rest of the food wasn't anything special
column2: however. My wife had the corned beef hash; the beef was stringy
column4: and it was sorely in need of spice
column5: or some kind of seasoning. I also tasted a salmon salad
column6: which was pretty good but not mindblowing. And the apple pie was a downer. Way too much pie crust
column7: which was buttery and flaky but lacked crispness
column8: and the small amount of apples inside were pretty bland. The chocolate shake was very good but also very expensive.
